import numpy as np

def score(item: int, bins: np.ndarray) -> np.ndarray:
    remaining_capacity = bins - item
    max_capacity = np.amax(bins)

    scores = np.full_like(bins, -np.inf)
    largest_capacity_indices = np.where(bins == max_capacity)[0]
    for i in largest_capacity_indices:
        scores[i] = remaining_capacity[i] / max_capacity

    sorted_indices = np.argsort(scores)[::-1]
    scores = scores[sorted_indices]

    return scores
